message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "Risk-off bias into Friday with IT, consumer and renewables weak; autos and select metals held better. Many watchlist names sat just below breakout levels (AUBANK ~745, SBICARD ~890, ASHOKLEY ~144.5, HINDCOPPER ~318/322). For Monday, start with small, liquid positions near defined support in ASHOKLEY and HINDCOPPER, keep risk tight (~1%/trade), and add only on confirmed breakouts.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "ASHOKLEY",
      "shares": 70,
      "amount": 9940,
      "reason": "Starter near 140–142 support with improving relative strength; stop ₹139.00. Will add on confirmed breakout >₹144.5 with volume."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "HINDCOPPER",
      "shares": 35,
      "amount": 10920,
      "reason": "Buying at 310–312 support with strong weekly volumes; stop ₹308.00. Plan to add on strength through ₹318/₹322 with volume."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 4140,
    "total_value": 25000,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 units",
      "HINDCOPPER: 35 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.00%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove PAGEIND: ticket too large for ₹25k portfolio; revisit if portfolio scales.",
    "Remove DIXON: high price limits effective sizing.",
    "Remove KAYNES: high price; cannot size position prudently.",
    "Remove AMBER: high price; not capital-efficient for current portfolio.",
    "Remove GILLETTE: high price; low position scalability.",
    "Remove ZFCVINDIA: very high price; unsuitable sizing.",
    "Remove LMW: high price; unsuitable for current capital.",
    "Remove ABBOTINDIA: high price; inefficient sizing.",
    "Remove OFSS: high price; position sizing constraints.",
    "Remove PEL: inconsistent liquidity (0 volume print); deprioritize for now."
  ]
}
